name: Iron Snout+
description:
Play my new Bacon May Die brawler game (Android)!

Iron Snout is a fast, colorful and brutal fighting game in which you will be helping a piglet fight for its life against endless hordes of wolves.

Smash your hooves at the directional keys or WASD to perform various spectacular and brutal fighting moves. Questionable 1 v 1 volleyball game mode is also available in this version!

Consider downloading a mobile version to your phone if you enjoyed the game or sharing it with your friends or family!

Following SnoutUp on Twitter is also highly recommended.
